mapper.select: select category from category where rownum <= 11 order by category
select category,img from category where rownum <= 9

select * from( select l.lcode,main_img, lname, teacher_name, substr(address,1,instr(address,'시')-1) si, substr(address,instr(address,'시')+2,instr(address,'구')-instr(address,'시')-2) gu,l_date, avg(nvl(r.score,0)) star from lesson l left join review r on l.lcode=r.lcode group by l_date,l.lcode,main_img, banner_img, lname, teacher_name, address order by star desc,l_date )where rownum<=9

select * from (select client_id, r.lcode, subject,r.contents, score, r_date, rank() over(partition by r.lcode order by r_date desc) rank, l.main_img, lname from review r, lesson l where l.lcode=r.lcode) where score>=4 and rownum<=6 and rank=1 order by r_date desc,score
